snippet: Rashid Rehman, a human rights activist who had received threats for defending people charged under Pakistan’s blasphemy laws, was killed in his office.
abstract: Veteran Pakistani human rights activist Rashid Rehman is shot dead in the southern city of Multan; Rehman had received death threats for defending people charged under country's blasphemy laws.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: Rashid Rehman, a human rights activist who had received threats for defending people charged under Pakistan’s blasphemy laws, was killed in his office.

headline.main: Pakistani Activist Shot Dead; Aided Blasphemy Suspects
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Activist Shot Dead; Aided Blasphemy Suspects

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
